Title: Punk Hunt | Find them all
Name: Punk Hunt
AboutContent: As part of the ‚ÄòPixelated‚Äô exhibition by SaveArtSpace, CryptoPunks will be displayed on 96 billboards and bus shelters across Miami. The exhibition will last for one month beginning April 12th.
Get a chance to win 0.5 ETH, while CryptoPunks are taking over billboards and bus shelters.
Find one of those four punks on billboards or bus stops across Miami:
Take a selfie with the Punks.
Tag us with the hashtags #punkhunt and #cryptopunks.
At the end of the exhibition, a lucky winner of our prize draw will be chosen at random.
To receive and redeem the prize you need a ETH-wallet address.
